properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @copyright Copyright (C) 2010-2012 Combodo SARL * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0 */

method.comment: /** * Maps the given context parameter name to the appropriate filter/search code for this class * @param string $sContextParam Name of the context parameter, e.g. 'org_id' * @return string Filter code, e.g. 'customer_id' */

dashlet.title: UI-ServiceManagementOverview-CustomerContractToRenew
dashlet.query: SELECT CustomerContract AS c WHERE c.end_date < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)

dashlet.title: UI-ServiceManagementOverview-ProviderContractToRenew
dashlet.query: SELECT ProviderContract AS c WHERE c.end_date < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
